snippet.title: Broken Sword Shadow of the Templars: Reforged — Reveal Trailer | Xbox @ Gamescom 2023
snippet.description: Check out the trailer for Broken Sword - Parzival's Stone, the sixth chapter in Revolution Software's Broken Sword series, and Broken Sword - Shadow of the Templars: Reforged, the 4K remaster of the 1996 point-and-click adventure title.

localized.title: Broken Sword Shadow of the Templars: Reforged — Reveal Trailer | Xbox @ Gamescom 2023
localized.description: Check out the trailer for Broken Sword - Parzival's Stone, the sixth chapter in Revolution Software's Broken Sword series, and Broken Sword - Shadow of the Templars: Reforged, the 4K remaster of the 1996 point-and-click adventure title.
